full_summary:
### **Communication Consultants (Web Communications Advisors)**

#### **Tender Details**

* **Tender Number:** #5000078074
* **Amendment**: Amendment #2
* **Publication Date:** February 29, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 25, 2024, 2:00 pm EST
* **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 280 Slater, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 5S9, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Email: solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (000) 000-0000
* **Tender Description:**

The Communications Consultants (Web Communications Advisors) will provide strategic advice on web content using metrics/analytics, strategic priorities, central agency direction, and user needs as inputs. They will guide clients in developing GC-wide content to ensure horizontal alignment, build connections, and improve cross-promotion and integration. The online strategies and recommendations will be informed by online trends, information architecture design, website management principles, and Treasury Board Secretariat (TBS) web standards.

The successful contractor will support CNSC clients and stakeholders on a case-by-case basis and review-edit-make accessible-coordinate the publishing aspects of their work under the technical guidance of the CNSC Senior Communication Consultants (Web Communications Advisors).

#### **Services Required**

* Develop and maintain professional web content
* Provide technical assistance in information architecture, website management, and analysis.
* Collaborate with CNSC stakeholders on digital communications and project management requirements
* Assist in the development of metrics/array towards web publishing

#### **Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating being awarded the contract.

#### **Solicitation Documents:**

Please refer to the solicitation documents for detailed requirements and evaluation criteria.
